item.description:
New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association

UPCOMING MEETING:

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NHREIA

Presents

Attorney Andrew Sullivan

Wednesday night, December 12, 2007

(at the regular monthly meeting) AND

WHAT: Don?t miss Attorney Andrew H. Sullivan as he reviews for NHREIA members the private lending requirements/prohibitions pursuant to New Hampshire banking laws and the new "Pre-foreclosure" law (RSA 479-B, enacted and made effective as of July 16, 2007. His focus will be on what you need to do to be compliant with these laws if you fall within their jurisdiction, and what you need to do to stay outside of their jurisdiction in the first place.

WHO: Attorney Sullivan is a New Hampshire attorney for almost twenty years, located in Bedford, specializing in real estate and business law, with an emphasis on real estate development, private lending, innovative acquisition, sale/leasebacks, entity formation and asset protection. His client list includes banks, builders and developers, as well as private lenders, rental property owners, and landlords. Many of his clients are purchaser of distress property. In addition to real estate transactions and business contracting and formation, Atty. Sullivan represents clients before courts, administrative agencies, zoning boards and planning boards.

WHEN: Dec 12th, Networking begins at 6:00 PM, meeting begins at 6:30 PM

WHERE: Dec Meeting at The Quality Inn/Wayfarer ? 121 South River Road, Bedford, NH

****AS OF JANUARY 2008, NHREIA IS PLEASED TO ANNOUNCE WE ARE MOVING OUR VENUE TO THE BEST WESTERN/EXECUTIVE COURT INN, 13500 S WILLOW ST, MANCHESTER, NH

Quality Inn/Wayfarer Convention Center, Bedford, NH

Register online at: www.NHREIA.com
item.name: The New Hampshire Real Estate Investors Association December Meetup
